title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4055 - Registration Of Race Horses
content:

§ 4055.1 - Horse ineligible unless registered
§ 4055.2 - Application for registration
§ 4055.3 - Names subject to approval
§ 4055.4 - Changing name of horse
§ 4055.5 - Owners Registry

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4055

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1934, ch. 310, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
